# correlationType

**Instance Property**

The type of correlation to search for.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var correlationType: HKCorrelationType { get }
```

## Getting Property Data

- **samplePredicates**: A dictionary whose keys are [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKSampleType] instances and whose values are [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSPredicate] instances.
